The 433 app is the ultimate football experience for every football lover. 433 changes the rules of the game by offering you content from within the locker room. This unique angle allows us to deliver behind-the-scenes footage of the world’s biggest clubs, while bringing you closer than ever to your favorite players. Our media feature provides you with exclusive content and tells you the stories you had never heard before. - Podcast
- Player documentaries
- Short film
- 433 awards
- Player takeovers
- Player interviews
- Funny clips

Get up-to-date information such as:
- Scores
- Line up
- Game stats
- League standings
- Calendar overview
- Player stats

Stay on top of the news and never miss any breaking stories coming out of your favorite league or club. Keep track of your team’s transfer developments, injury updates, unmissable quotes & reactions from across the football world.

Simply take photos of an indoor bouldering or rock climbing wall with your phone, touch the holds you want to include and save your climb so you can share with others.

Don’t like climbing on crimps? Love Slab?

As you ski, Carv will measure your max speed, average speed, distance, descent, number of runs, number of turns and more. Carv then generates a detailed activity map with performance data from your day on the slopes. 

After you’ve tracked your day on the mountain, compare your stats with friends and family. Think you’ve really got what it takes? See how you stack up against professional and Olympic skiers with Carv’s leaderboard. 

To really take your skiing to the next level, connect the app to the Carv smart ski boot insole for real-time audio instruction. Carv uses advanced pressure sensors to see exactly where your skiing technique is lacking, then immediately tells you how to improve as you ski. Carv is the world’s first ski wearable with real-time audio coaching.  

Features of Carv 
Generate a detailed activity map of your ski day 
Clock your average and maximum speed 
Measure your distance and vertical descent 
Track your number of runs and turns automatically 
Compare your data with friends, family and professional athletes 
Connect with Carv smart ski boot insole
Connect with Apple Health to share your ski data with other apps and review it in the Apple Health app

MultiSport goes digital!

*Please note that this app is in early access. You might experience temporary issues while visiting facilities and registering the visit digitally. In such a case please do not hesitate to contact us.

Also when you activate virtual card your plastic MultiSport card cannot be used anymore. 

Switch to a virtual card in the application and use just a QR code to check in at sports facilities.

Here is how:

Create a profile on MyMultiSport, or if you are already registered, simply log in to your account

Verify your mobile number

Upload a picture of yourself

Generate a QR code and gain digital entry to all MultiSport facilities!

Find your sport and the place to be active!

The application allows you to find all locations where you can use your MultiSport card.

Browse various sports facilities and discover YOUR place to do sports.
